channel.title: Item 1 click picking up?
channel.description:
Ok, can somebody help me?
If you have played dodian.com
you know how if you click on an item, it picks it up without clicking it multiple times?
Like on RS too.
How do you do that?
Can someone post a mini-tut or something?
Thanks
